# sharedColorPanelExists

**Type Property**

Returns  a Boolean value indicating whether the `NSColorPanel` has been created already.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var sharedColorPanelExists: Bool { get }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the `NSColorPanel` has been created already; otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Obtaining the shared color panel

- **shared**: Returns the shared `NSColorPanel` instance, creating it if necessary.
